statements: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT order_id, book_id, status FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 101 AND quantity >= 5;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, book_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_id ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY customer_id, order_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 2 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email, shipping_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '1aae2102-1a76-4d4e-996c-dc2d0e4e8b0b';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.customer_name, c.email, o.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, c.customer_name, c.email FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE o.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT c.*, o.total_amount FROM customers c LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id ORDER BY o.total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipping_details WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_info;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;

SELECT orders.order_id, customer_name, email, address, city FROM orders JOIN shipping_details ON orders.order_id = shipping_details.order_id JOIN customer_info ON customer_info.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, last_name, first_name FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_qty > 0;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_qty > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT shipment_id, order_id, tracking_number FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) as num_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_orders > 1;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT title, author, genre FROM books WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT MAX(total_amount) AS max_total FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT title, author, genre FROM books ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT address_line1, city, state, postal_code FROM addresses WHERE state = 'California';
